title: Anyone else having connection issues?
body: First I thought it was just a chat issue which I don't get them normally but I have gotten them a few times in the past and never has effected my game play, But I just sat through an entire game " Attempting to reconnect " And could not do anything... If I step into lane I would get "Attempting to reconnect " I could type just fine as if I wasn't having issues, I also disconnected 4 times. But in the champion select it would constantly say disconnected from pvp.net and instantly reconnect and I couldn't type to anyone. Just wondering if it's just me, I reset my internet and my computer though I don't think it has anything to do with my computer since it's new, And as soon as I connected after a internet reset it instantly does the " Attempting to reconnect " Also my ping wasn't jumping up and down it was at a solid 90 and that's playable for me my normal is 45 but I wouldn't just disconnect with 90 ping, I tried a speed test and my internet seemed fine, Loaded pretty fast and normal, So is anyone else having this problem or is it just me? I would really like to just be able to play league again normally..

replies.body: Even with a great computer or internet you can still have issues reaching specific servers, like our game server.   You'll want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up and make sure your network doesn't cut you off from the game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I'm having lag and ping issues but no disconnecting. This is the thread I made http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sBMf0K0v-74-patch-random-lag-spikes. So you're not the only one.
